object.content:
HIRUDINI UDUGAMA
 QA ENGINEER
 PERSONAL PROFILE
 A responsible, self-motivated, skillful, dedicated undergraduate  
 with team spirit and leadership qualities who is willing to accept 
 challenges, seeking an opportunity as a quality assurance 
 engineer to apply and explore the existing and forthcoming 
 technologies in the field of Information Technology
 CONTACT
 WORK EXPERIENCE
 No.218/1, Ganegedara,
 Boyagane, Kurunegala
 Ceyleon Solutions (Pvt) Ltd  2019/09 – 2020/02 
 Software Engineer cum Quality Assurance Engineer Intern
 +94 711962344
 hirudinitu@gmail.com
 Regional Development Bank Provincial Office 
 ( North Western Province - Finance department )
 2015/10 – 2016/10
 Banking trainee
 
 https://www.linkedin.com/in/
 hirudini-udugama-00b476155/
 https://github.com/
 HirudiniUdugama
 EDUCATIONAL HISTORY
 TECHNICAL SKILLS
 University of Moratuwa
 BSc (Hons) in Information Technology
 Programming Languages: Java, C
 SGPA - 3.3 (L3S1)
 Test Automation: Selenium, TestNG, 
 Katalon studio, JMeter
 Holy Family Convent -  Kurunegala
 Web Development: HTML, CSS, 
 G. C. E. Advanced Level
 Biological Science Stream (2015) 
 Physics - B, Chemistry - B, Biology - B, 
 General English – B
 Bootstrap, JavaScript, NodeJS, Angular, 
 PHP, XML, Wordpress
 Mobile Development: 
 Mobile Development: Flutter
 Databases: MySQL, DynamoDB
 G. C. E. Ordinary Level (2010) 8A’s , 1B
 IDEs: Visual studio, IntelliJ Idea, Eclipse, 
 Android studio, PyCharm
 Version control systems: Bitbucket, Git
 PROFFESSIONAL QULIFICATIONS
 Project Management Tools : Jira, 
 ProjectLibre, Trello 
 Applications:
 Applications: MS Office suite, Adobe 
 University of Colombo School of Computing 
 photoshop, Protege, Weka
 Completed Software Quality Assurance using test automation 
 framework course 
 Manual Test: Test Case Design, Test 
 Execution, Bug Tracking & Reporting, Test 
 Coursera professional certificates
 report creation
 Agile and Jira - authorized by Atlassian 
 AWS - authorized by Amazon Web Services 
 Introduction to Artificial Intelligence - authorized by IBM
 NON TECHNICAL SKILLS
 Team Management, Interpersonal skills, 
 Leadership, Good communication skills
 PROJECTS
 BSc Level 4 Final Year Project : Automatic Computer 
 Recognition of Printed music (Ongoing) 
 The aim of the projects is to recognize music notations in either 
 printed or handwritten materials and generate the relevant music. 
 Technologies : Machine learning, Python, OpenCV
 
 BSc
 BSc Level 3 Independent Research : Emergency Detection 
 using Audio 
 Audio command recognition, emergency detection, sound source 
 localization, malicious audio source detection, sound classification 
 and communication related to detect an emergency using audio.
 BSc Level 2 Software Project : Intern Management System 
 Mentored by – 99X Technologies 
 W
 Web based solution to manage interns’ details and activities. 
 Technologies : Angular6, NodeJS, AWS web technologies
 ACTIVITIES
 BSc Level 1 Hardware Project : Safety Helmet 
 An automated helmet that identifies speed, geo-location and 
 vibrations. 
 Technologies : ATmega32A, C
 
 Breakdown24*7
 Medium writer 
 Writer at Noteworthy - The journal blog
 https://medium.com/@HirudiniUdugama
 Breakdown24*7 
 Involved in developing mobile application. This project supports 
 the community in an emergency of a vehicle such as tyre punch, 
 technical issues, fuel and battery issues and engine troubles. This 
 application helps drivers to contact a suitable party to resolve the 
 vehicle issue by tracking the location of the driver. 
 Technologies - Flutter, Android studio
 
 Tech Blogger 
 https://horizontechzone.blogspot.com
 Hackothons
 “Hack Moral” coding competition held 
 by Faculty of Information Technology, 
 University of Moratuwa (2018) - 
 participated
 
 Bookclub 
 Involved in web application. Bookclub is a platform that helps 
 authors to sell books online in e-pub3 version as well as reader can 
 purchase through this application. 
 Technologies– PHP, Octobercms (php framework), MySQL
 
 A
 “Code Rush” coding competition held 
 “Code Rush” coding competition held 
 by Faculty of Information Technology, 
 University of Moratuwa (2018) - 
 participated
 A pharmaceutical company website 
 Technologies : MySQL, Wordpress (http://zionhealthcare.lk/)
 NON RELATED REFREES
 AWARD AND ACHIVEMENTS
 Dr. Lochandaka Ranathunga 
 Head 
 Dept. Of Information Technology
 Faculty of Information Technology 
 University of Moratuwa 
 Mobile: +94712207030
